languages.text: Хаос дрогнет перед поступью Вольного Торговца, ибо за {mf|ним|ней} следует порядок.

traits.locale_text: Хаос дрогнет перед поступью Вольного Торговца, ибо за {mf|ним|ней} следует порядок.

languages.text: All who disobey shall tremble before the Rogue Trader's stride, for in {mf|his|her} wake, order marches.
languages.original_text: Хаос дрогнет перед поступью Вольного Торговца, ибо за {mf|ним|ней} следует порядок.

traits.locale_text: All who disobey shall tremble before the Rogue Trader's gait, for in {mf|his|her} wake, order marches.

All who disobey shall tremble before the Rogue Trader's stride, for in {mf|his|her} wake, order marches.
All who disobey shall tremble before the Rogue Trader's stride, for in {mf|his|her} wake, order marches.

languages.text: İtaat etmeyen herkes, Hür Tacir'in adımları karşısında titreyecek. Onun ayağını bastığı her yere düzen gelecek.
languages.original_text: All who disobey shall tremble before the Rogue Trader's stride, for in {mf|his|her} wake, order marches.

traits.locale_text: İtaat etmeyen herkes, Hür Tacir'in adımları karşısında titreyecek. Onun ayağını bastığı her yere düzen gelecek.

languages.text: Ceux qui désobéissent trembleront en voyant venir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, car l'ordre marche dans son sillage.
languages.original_text: All who disobey shall tremble before the Rogue Trader's stride, for in {mf|his|her} wake, order marches.

traits.locale_text: Ceux qui désobéissent trembleront en voyant venir {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, car l'ordre marche dans son sillage.

languages.text: 法に背くすべての者は、ローグトレーダーの歩みに恐れおののくだろう。なぜなら、{mf|彼|彼女}の行く先には秩序が行進するのだから。
languages.original_text: All who disobey shall tremble before the Rogue Trader's stride, for in {mf|his|her} wake, order marches.

traits.locale_text: 法に背くすべての者は、ローグトレーダーの歩みに恐れおののくだろう。なぜなら、{mf|彼|彼女}の行く先には秩序が行進するのだから。

languages.text: 行商浪人大步向前，{mf|他|她}的脚步代表着秩序，所有不肯服从命令的人都将瑟瑟发抖，
languages.original_text: All who disobey shall tremble before the Rogue Trader's stride, for in {mf|his|her} wake, order marches.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人大步向前，{mf|他|她}的脚步代表着秩序，所有不肯服从命令的人都将瑟瑟发抖，

languages.text: Todos cuantos desobedezcan temblarán ante los pasos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, ya que el orden l{mf|o|a} sigue en todo momento.
languages.original_text: All who disobey shall tremble before the Rogue Trader's stride, for in {mf|his|her} wake, order marches.

traits.locale_text: Todos cuantos desobedezcan temblarán ante los pasos de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, ya que el orden l{mf|o|a} sigue en todo momento.

languages.text: Wer nicht gehorcht, wird vor {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} erzittern, denn an {mf|seiner|ihrer} Seite marschiert die Ordnung.
languages.original_text: All who disobey shall tremble before the Rogue Trader's stride, for in {mf|his|her} wake, order marches.
